es.upm.ies.goniophotometer.utils

Class CSVWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.upm.ies.goniophotometer.utils.CSVWriter

  • public class CSVWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to write CSV (Comma-Separated Values) files.
    Author:
    Abdón Alejandro Vivas Imparato

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String COMMA
      Comma character, represented as a string for convenience.
      static java.lang.String NEW_LINE
      Carriage return (\r) followed by a newline (\n).
      static java.lang.String SEMICOLON
      Semicolon character, represented as a string for convenience.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeCSV()
      Closes the CSV file.

      Creates the CSV file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CSVWriter

        public CSVWriter(java.lang.String filename,
                 java.lang.String separator)
        Creates a new CSVWriter instance with the specified filename and separator. The filename must not contain the extension, as this class just writes CSV files.
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename of the CSV file.
        separator - Separator used to separate fields.

    • Method Detail

      • createCSV

        public void createCSV()
               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the CSV file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • writeField

        public void writeField(java.lang.String value)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a new field (next column of the previously written field, in the same row) in the CSV file.
        Parameters:
        value - Value of the new field.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • nextLine

        public void nextLine()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Jumps to the next row of data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • closeCSV

        public void closeCSV()
              throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
